document.full_text: renowned economist hernando de soto said on thursday presidential candidate keiko fujimori backs anti-poverty programs he has implemented around the world and that they will help peru avert nagging social conflicts.
document.title: de soto says fujimori backs peru anti-poverty plan
lines_and_colors: renowned economist hernando de soto said on thursday presidential candidate keiko fujimori backs anti-poverty programs he has implemented around the world and that they will help peru avert nagging social conflicts.
